issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: instance restore fails when launch index is > 0, CLC locks up

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi All,

Setup a cloud with following topology

CLC/UFS with RiakCs - 1
CC/SC - 1
NC - 1
SC - Overlay
Network - EDGE

Following packages

{code}
# rpm -qa | grep euca
eucalyptus-release-4.0-1.el6.noarch
euca2ools-3.1.0-0.0.196.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.1051.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cloud-4.0.0-0.0.1051.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-sos-plugins-0.1.6-0.el6.noarch
euca2ools-release-3.1-1.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.1051.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.1051.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.1051.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-1.0.5-0.206.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.174.el6.x86_64
{code}

Following is euca-describe-services

{code}
# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	bootstrap         	bootstrap 	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.104.1.212/ 
SERVICE	reporting         	bootstrap 	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	cluster           	cloud4    	cc01                 	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.10.58:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud4:cluster:cc01/
SERVICE	storage           	cloud4    	sc01                 	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.10.58:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud4:storage:sc01/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	imaging           	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imaging:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	autoscalingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	dns               	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.104.1.212         	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.104.1.212/
SERVICE	user-api          	mycloud   	mycloud              	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:user-api:mycloud/
SERVICE	autoscaling       	mycloud   	mycloud.autoscaling  	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:autoscaling:mycloud.autoscaling/
SERVICE	cloudwatch        	mycloud   	mycloud.cloudwatch   	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:cloudwatch:mycloud.cloudwatch/
SERVICE	compute           	mycloud   	mycloud.compute      	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:compute:mycloud.compute/
SERVICE	euare             	mycloud   	mycloud.euare        	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:euare:mycloud.euare/
SERVICE	loadbalancing     	mycloud   	mycloud.loadbalancing	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:loadbalancing:mycloud.loadbalancing/
SERVICE	objectstorage     	mycloud   	mycloud.objectstorage	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:objectstorage:mycloud.objectstorage/
SERVICE	tokens            	mycloud   	mycloud.tokens       	ENABLED 	27  	http://10.104.1.212:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:mycloud:tokens:mycloud.tokens/
{code}

After uploading a precise x86_64 HVM image, I ran 3 instances on the cloud. Enabled monitoring on all 3 instances and decreased the instance timeout from 720 to 1.

Next I stopped the eucalyptus-nc service on the NC and waited for the CLC to kick off the termination of the instances after the timeout is hit (1 minute).

Noticed that the CLC terminated all instances but kept showing NC as {{ENABLED}} in its {{euca-describe-nodes}} etc.

Then started the eucalyptus-nc service back and noticed following error on the CLC

{code}
2014-05-27 20:53:17 DEBUG 000001379 JobRunShell              | Calling execute on job OsgJobs.job2

{code}

In {{euca-describe-instances}} there are 3 instances shown as terminated and one has appeared after this activity which is stuck at pending forever.

I tried to run new instances and all went running on the NC but are stuck at CLC showing pending as the status.

Also the CC is doing transition? according  to CLC logs, continuously

{code}
2014-05-27 20:56:25 ERROR 000000043 Topology                 | CHECK:null  arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud4:cluster:cc01/ ENABLED->ENABLED=ENABLED [Transition request state=ENABLED rejected because of an ongoing transition: State:name=arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud4:cluster:cc01/:state=ENABLED:mark=true:transition=TRANSITION arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud4:cluster:cc01/ #5935 ENABLED_CHECK ActiveTransition name=ENABLED_CHECK from=ENABLED/false to=ENABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=CHECK id=5935 startTime=Tue May 27 20:53:25 PDT 2014]

2014-05-27 20:56:25 DEBUG 000002123 AbstractListenableFuture | Listener failed to execute within the time limit (30): ListenableFuture.ExecPair.listener BasicCallbackProcessor:callback=.util.async.AsyncRequest$1 [com.eucalyptus.util.concurrent.AbstractListenableFuture$ExecPair$1.apply(AbstractListenableFuture.java:266)] [com.eucalyptus.system.Threads.filteredStack(Threads.java:565)] using executor com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$ThreadPool@35081871
{code}

euca-describe-instances before instance restore

{code}

fields.summary: CLONE - for 4.1 - instance restore fails when launch index is > 0, CLC locks up

comments.body: Fixed by merge of 4.0.1 to testing.
